CHECK1REP: Enable the system to send notifications related to this post to your email?
ABOUTUSTEXT: LostFound is a web-based system that will allow users to report lost or found items on Campus. The system provides a simple and user friendly interaction with the user. Every user that wants to browse across any of the versions of this web-app will be able to do so without any registration, in case of reporting an item or making a review, some requirements  may be needed. LostFound consists of features that can make people reunite with their valuables through a very intuitive navigation across the web.

PRIVACYTEXT: Your privacy is very important to us. Accordingly, we have developed this Policy in order for you to understand how we collect, use, communicate and disclose and make use of personal information. The following outlines our privacy policy. Before or at the time of collecting personal information, we will identify the purposes for which information is being collected. We will collect and use of personal information solely with the objective of fulfilling those purposes specified by us and for other compatible purposes, unless we obtain the consent of the individual concerned or as required by law. We will only retain personal information as long as necessary for the fulfillment of those purposes. We will collect personal information by lawful and fair means and, where appropriate, with the knowledge or consent of the individual concerned. Personal data should be relevant to the purposes for which it is to be used, and, to the extent necessary for those purposes, should be accurate, complete, and up-to-date. We will protect personal information by reasonable security safeguards against loss or theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification. We will make readily available to customers information about our policies and practices relating to the management of personal information. We are committed to conducting our business in accordance with these principles in order to ensure that the confidentiality of personal information is protected and maintained.
RESETKEYTEXT: Lost your key? Or need to change it for security reasons?
HOMETEXT: Home consists of a news feed of the most recent post in the system.
LOSTTEXT: Lost lets user report and search items that are lost. Some information is requierd regarding the item and the user.
FOUNDTEXT: Found lets user report and search items that are found. Some information is requiererd regarding the item and the user.
REPORTITEMTEXT: Report Item  is the same interface for reporting a lost or found item. Here the user sumbits the required information of the item and user.
VIEWITEMTEXT: View Item lets users see the posted item other user have reported.
COMMENTTEXT: Comments lets users comment and comunicate with other users who have search for their lost items.
CONTACTUSTEXT: Contact Us contains all the contact information of the administrators and also a feedback section to make suggestions, complains and comments of the LostFound Application.
